scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.deploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=domain node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.domain
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.development
